UData\Widgets\StdBase

The standard class that all widgets inherit. Can be used to create any widget required. By using the `string` option.

Information

An optional options object to intiailize the widget with.

Display
public function Display ()

Outputs the widget representation string to the stream.

Returns

Void

ToString
public function ToString ()

Returns the widget representation string.

This widget will output the option `string` verbatium.
Therefore, it can be used to create any needed widget string.
Returns

String
